info.description: Azure Application Insights client for Components.
info.title: ApplicationInsightsManagementClient

get.description: Gets a list of all Application Insights components within a subscription.

200.description: A list containing 0 or more Application Insights component definitions.

schema.description: Describes the list of Application Insights Resources.

nextLink.description: The URI to get the next set of Application Insights component definitions if too many components where returned in the result set.

value.description: List of Application Insights component definitions.

kind.description: The kind of application that this component refers to, used to customize UI. This value is a freeform string, values should typically be one of the following: web, ios, other, store, java, phone.

properties.description: Properties that define an Application Insights component resource.

AppId.description: Application Insights Unique ID for your Application.

ApplicationId.description: The unique ID of your application. This field mirrors the 'Name' field and cannot be changed.

CreationDate.description: Creation Date for the Application Insights component, in ISO 8601 format.

Flow_Type.description: Used by the Application Insights system to determine what kind of flow this component was created by. This is to be set to 'Bluefield' when creating/updating a component via the REST API.

HockeyAppId.description: The unique application ID created when a new application is added to HockeyApp, used for communications with HockeyApp.

HockeyAppToken.description: Token used to authenticate communications with between Application Insights and HockeyApp.

InstrumentationKey.description: Application Insights Instrumentation key. A read-only value that applications can use to identify the destination for all telemetry sent to Azure Application Insights. This value will be supplied upon construction of each new Application Insights component.

Request_Source.description: Describes what tool created this Application Insights component. Customers using this API should set this to the default 'rest'.

SamplingPercentage.description: Percentage of the data produced by the application being monitored that is being sampled for Application Insights telemetry.

provisioningState.description: Current state of this component: whether or not is has been provisioned within the resource group it is defined. Users cannot change this value but are able to read from it. Values will include Succeeded, Deploying, Canceled, and Failed.

get.description: Gets a list of Application Insights components within a resource group.

parameters.description: The name of the resource group.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

HockeyAppToken.description: Token used to authenticate communications with between Application Insights and HockeyApp.

parameters.name: resourceGroupName

200.description: Successful request when deleting an Application Insights component.

204.description: The specified component does not exist.

patch.description: Updates an existing component's tags. To update other fields use the CreateOrUpdate method.

parameters.description: The name of the resource group.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.description: The name of the Application Insights component resource.
parameters.name: resourceName

200.description: Updating the Application Insights component's tags was successful. Component tags are updated and returned with the rest of the Component's object properties.

kind.description: The kind of application that this component refers to, used to customize UI. This value is a freeform string, values should typically be one of the following: web, ios, other, store, java, phone.

tags.CustomField_01: Custom text in some random field named randomly
Custom text in some random field named randomly

schema.description: A container holding only the Tags for a resource, allowing the user to update the tags on a WebTest instance.

requestBody.description: Updated tag information to set into the component instance.

put.description: Creates (or updates) an Application Insights component. Note: You cannot specify a different value for InstrumentationKey nor AppId in the Put operation.

parameters.description: The name of the resource group.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.description: The name of the Application Insights component resource.
parameters.name: resourceName

200.description: Successful request when creating or updating an Application Insights component. The updated component is returned.

kind.description: The kind of application that this component refers to, used to customize UI. This value is a freeform string, values should typically be one of the following: web, ios, other, store, java, phone.

HockeyAppToken.description: Token used to authenticate communications with between Application Insights and HockeyApp.

requestBody.description: Properties that need to be specified to create an Application Insights component.

get.description: Get status for an ongoing purge operation.

parameters.description: The name of the resource group.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.description: The name of the Application Insights component resource.
parameters.name: resourceName

parameters.description: In a purge status request, this is the Id of the operation the status of which is returned.
parameters.name: purgeId

200.description: Returns status of purge operation in body of response. e.g.:  running, completed.

schema.description: Response containing status for a specific purge operation.

status.description: Status of the operation represented by the requested Id.

post.description: Purges data in an Application Insights component by a set of user-defined filters.

parameters.description: The name of the resource group.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.description: The name of the Application Insights component resource.
parameters.name: resourceName

202.description: Accepted request for purging an Application Insights component.

schema.description: Response containing operationId for a specific purge action.

operationId.description: Id to use when querying for status for a particular purge operation.

schema.description: Describes the body of a purge request for an App Insights component

filters.description: The set of columns and filters (queries) to run over them to purge the resulting data.

items.description: User-defined filters to return data which will be purged from the table.

column.description: The column of the table over which the given query should run

key.description: When filtering over custom dimensions, this key will be used as the name of the custom dimension.

operator.description: A query operator to evaluate over the provided column and value(s).

value.description: the value for the operator to function over. This can be a number (e.g., > 100), a string (timestamp >= '2017-09-01') or array of values.

table.description: Table from which to purge data.

requestBody.description: Describes the body of a request to purge data in a single table of an Application Insights component

kind.description: The kind of application that this component refers to, used to customize UI. This value is a freeform string, values should typically be one of the following: web, ios, other, store, java, phone.

ComponentPurgeBody.description: Describes the body of a purge request for an App Insights component

filters.description: The set of columns and filters (queries) to run over them to purge the resulting data.

items.description: User-defined filters to return data which will be purged from the table.

column.description: The column of the table over which the given query should run

key.description: When filtering over custom dimensions, this key will be used as the name of the custom dimension.

operator.description: A query operator to evaluate over the provided column and value(s).

value.description: the value for the operator to function over. This can be a number (e.g., > 100), a string (timestamp >= '2017-09-01') or array of values.

table.description: Table from which to purge data.

ComponentPurgeBodyFilters.description: User-defined filters to return data which will be purged from the table.

column.description: The column of the table over which the given query should run

key.description: When filtering over custom dimensions, this key will be used as the name of the custom dimension.

operator.description: A query operator to evaluate over the provided column and value(s).

value.description: the value for the operator to function over. This can be a number (e.g., > 100), a string (timestamp >= '2017-09-01') or array of values.

ComponentPurgeResponse.description: Response containing operationId for a specific purge action.

operationId.description: Id to use when querying for status for a particular purge operation.

ComponentPurgeStatusResponse.description: Response containing status for a specific purge operation.

status.description: Status of the operation represented by the requested Id.
